snippet: Mrs. Clinton, who was addressing a group in Las Vegas, ducked and laughed off the episode.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton is interrupted during Las Vegas speech, when woman in audience throws shoe at her; Clinton ducks and laughs off episode, but security guards detain woman.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton, who was addressing a group in Las Vegas, ducked and laughed off the episode.

headline.main: Shoe Thrown at Hillary Clinton During Speech
headline.print_headline: Shoe Is Thrown, but Clinton Ducks
